quotes.message: Still, it was a sad state of the world that people judged others not by the best that they could be but by the worst thought in their own hearts.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Hoyt

quotes.message: Judge tenderly, if you must. There is usually a side you have not heard, a story you know nothing about, and a battle waged that you are not having to fight.
quotes.name: Traci Lea Larussa

quotes.message: When we stop judging others and ourselves, our heart begins to open.
quotes.name: Swami Dhyan Giten

quotes.message: Our judgements judge us, and nothing reveals us, exposes our weaknesses, more ingeniously than the attitude of pronouncing upon our fellows.
quotes.name: Paul Valery Flametree

quotes.message: We should be rigorous in judging ourselves and gracious in judging others.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: Judging others is just wasting your time, giving your advice to men who don't pay.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: If I stop judging other people, I free myself from being judged, and I can dance!
quotes.name: Patti Digh

quotes.message: When you judge others, you do not define them, you define yourself.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Don't judge too harshly, for if your weaknesses were to be placed under your footsteps, most likely you would stumble and fall as well.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Judging is acting on a limited knowledge. Learn the art of observing without evaluating.
quotes.name: Pushpa Rana

quotes.message: When you judge other people without wanting to know the true story behind their actions, is usually when there is something inside of you that is so broken that if you found out what you believed about them was a lie, you wouldn't want to accept it or make amends.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Judging other people is such a natural and reflex phenomenon that even when somebody advises everybody not to judge anybody, actually he never realised that he has already judged that people judge others.
quotes.name: Anuj Somany

quotes.message: Let's stop judging others, and relieve them of the heavy burden they are carrying on their shoulders because of us.
quotes.name: Saurabh Sharma

quotes.message: And it is the Lord, it is Jesus, Who is my judge. Therefore I will try always to think leniently of others, that He may judge me leniently, or rather not at all, since He says: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged.
quotes.name: Therese de Lisieux

quotes.message: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation. It's one thing to feel that you are on the right path, but it's another to think that yours is the only path.
quotes.name: Paulo Coehlo

quotes.message: While you were busy judging others, you left your closet open and a lot of skeletons fell out.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: People who judge others tell more about Who They Are, than Who They Judge.
quotes.name: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.message: If we judge others, it is because we are judging something in ourselves of which we are unaware.
quotes.name: John A. Sandford

quotes.message: In judging others, folks will work overtime for no pay.
quotes.name: Charles Edwin Carruthers

quotes.message: The more one judges, the less one loves.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: When you meet a man, you judge him by his clothes; when you leave, you judge him by his heart.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: In judging of others, a man laboreth in vain, often erreth and easily sinneth; but in judging and examining himself, he always laboreth fruitfully.
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: To judge a man by his weakest link or deed is like judging the power of the ocean by one wave.
quotes.name: Elvis Presley

quotes.message: Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: A person that judges others will inevitably judge themselves harshly. It is only when one stops judging others that, that one can truly appreciate the beauty within.
quotes.name: Ando Oomae

quotes.message: None are more unjust in their judgments of others than those who have a high opinion of themselves.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: If you find it necessary to judge someone by their past, don't be surprised when they find it necessary to put you there.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When we come to judge others it is not by ourselves as we really are that we judge them, but by an image that we have formed of ourselves from which we have left out everything that offends our vanity or would discredit us in the eyes of the world.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: To judge a man means nothing more than to ask: What content does he give to the form of humanity? What concept should we have of humanity if he were its only representative?
quotes.name: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.message: I do not judge men by anything they can do. Their greatest deed is the impression they make on me.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Every man is entitled to be valued by his best moment.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Our natural egoism leads us to judge people by their relations to ourselves. We want them to be certain things to us, and for us that is what they are; because the rest of them is no good to us, we ignore it.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: By judging others, you make yourself easy to judge.
quotes.name: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.message: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Judge not, that ye be not judged.
quotes.name: The Bible

quotes.message: The least amount of judging we can do, the better off we are.
quotes.name: Michael J Fox

quotes.message: Don't pass judgement on others or you might be judged yourself.
quotes.name: Brian Cohen

quotes.message: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Instead of judging people, we need to pray.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: I can usually judge a fellow by what he laughs at.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: If you judge, investigate.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: If you would judge, understand.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Judge not according to appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: No accurate thinker will judge another person by that which the other person's enemies say about him.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Do not judge, and you will never be mistaken.
quotes.name: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: Judge not others unless you're prepared to be judged!
quotes.name: Johnny Rotten

quotes.message: People are always judging you based on where you're from, where you went to school, how you look, how you talk. But at the end of the day, you're going to have to look into the mirror and accept who you are. It's all about being authentic.
quotes.name: Andre Carson

quotes.message: The most dangerous leap is the leap to conclusions.
quotes.name: Woodrow Kroll

quotes.message: Never judge someone's character based on the words of another.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Your judgments about another person say more about your own character than the character of the person you are pointing a finger at.
quotes.name: Alaric Hutchinson

quotes.message: Judging others is easy because it distracts us from the responsibility of judging ourselves.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: When we generalize and judge people quickly without taking ample time, we've chosen a shortcut. It's superficial of us, and a lack of wisdom.
quotes.name: Assegid W. Habtewold

quotes.message: Praising God distracts us from the awful business of judging others and losing ourselves.
quotes.name: Brian A. Pankratz

quotes.message: He who judges himself will always judge others.
quotes.name: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.message: Judge not, that ye be not judged. For with judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged: and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.
quotes.name: Matthew 7:1-2

quotes.message: Do you, my friend, pass judgement on others? You have no excuse at all, whoever you are. For when you judge others and then do the same things which they do, you condemn yourself.
quotes.name: Romans 2:1

quotes.message: If you spend time judging and criticizing people, you will not have time to heal from your pain or brokenness. You cannot love yourself when you judge or criticize others who are created in God's image and after His Likeness...in which you are also created.
quotes.name: Kemi Sogunle

quotes.message: Judgment separates us from the people we want to be close to incredibly quickly. Whether it’s our internal self-judgment that shuts down opportunity for connection or our judgment of others that makes it hard for loved ones to open up to us, judgment is cancer for authenticity in relationships.
quotes.name: Gina Senarighi

quotes.message: People make mistakes. When you judge them, you measure their weakness against your own strength. That’s not a fair measure. They have their strength, too. Their strength might be the weakest point in your life.
quotes.name: Nesta Jojoe Erskine

quotes.message: Only the shallow judge others, those with character know to judge themselves before they judge others.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: We cannot judge either of the feelings or of the characters of men with perfect accuracy from their actions or their appearance in public; it is from their careless conversations, their half-finished sentences, that we may hope with the greatest probability of success to discover their real characters.
quotes.name: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.message: I know people can be judgmental and difficult. But if you shut yourself away from the world, you'll never see how beautiful it really is.
quotes.name: Imania Margria

quotes.message: Judging others is space-time wasted.
quotes.name: Rajesh

quotes.message: Judging the things you do not understand is like a game of gambling where setbacks are often than success.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Let us not therefor judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumbling block or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.
quotes.name: Romans 14:12-13

quotes.message: Who judges others condemns himself.
quotes.name: Martin H. Manser

quotes.message: No man can justify censure or condemn another because indeed no man truly knows another.
quotes.name: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.message: When it seems that God shows us the faults of others, keep on the safer side. It may be that thy judgment is false.
quotes.name: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.message: You will not become a saint through other people's sins.
quotes.name: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quotes.message: The business of finding fault is very easy, and that of doing better very difficult.
quotes.name: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.message: The Lord knows those who are His. He will determine the saved and unsaved, and will never ask any man's opinion. So let's not give one.
quotes.name: Virgil Hurley

quotes.message: A desire to disgrace others never sprang from grace.
quotes.name: George Swinnock

quotes.message: Do not think of the faults of others but of what is good in them and faulty in yourself.
quotes.name: St. Teresa of Avila

quotes.message: A man's judgment of another depends more on the judging and on his passions than on the one being judged and his conduct.
quotes.name: Paul Tournier

quotes.message: Judging others makes us blind, whereas love is illuminating.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: The only measure of judging a human being is through that person’s character, because character is not determined by race, religion, gender or social status.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: We are all flawed and creatures of our times.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Never judge people based on their nationality, religion, race, gender, skin colour or look. Humans are all the same. They’re God’s loving children.
quotes.name: Lily Amis

quotes.message: A man's judged by what he is and not what he was.
quotes.name: Jack Caldwell

quotes.message: Go a little easy on the people around you. Try to reel in judging thoughts. Think before you speak.
quotes.name: John Manning

quotes.message: We can learn how to stop judging and begin to accept and receive people where they are. Instead of judging them, we must become like them to win them.
quotes.name: Sandra M. Michelle
